required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluate the Efficacy, Immunogenicity and Safety of 9-valent HPV Recombinant Vaccine in Chinese Healthy Females
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter,Randomized,Blind and Positive-Controlled Phase Ⅲ Study to Evaluate the Efficacy, Immunogenicity and Safety of the 9-valent Human Papillomavirus (Types 6, 11, 16, 18,31,33,45,52 and 58) Recombinant Vaccine (Hansenula Polymorpha) in Chinese Female Subjects Aged 20-45 Years

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed to evaluate the vaccine efficacy, immunogenicity and safety of the 9-valent Human Papillomavirus (Types 6, 11, 16, 18,31,33,45,52 and 58) Recombinant Vaccine (Hansenula Polymorpha) in Chinese Female Subjects Aged 20-45 Years .

primary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of HPV 31-, 33-, 45-, 52-, and 58-related high-grade cervical abnormalities (CIN 2/3) at least 1 month post Dose 3
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 3 (Month 7) up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of HPV 31-, 33-, 45-, 52-, and 58-related 6-month and 12-month Persistent Infection at least 1 month post Dose 3
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 3 (Month 7) up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of HPV 31-, 33-, 45-, 52-, and 58-related VIN 1/2/3, VaIN1/2/3, AIN1/2/3, vulvar cancer, vaginal cancer and anal cancer at least 1 month post Dose 3
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 3 (Month 7) up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of HPV 31-, 33-, 45-, 52-, and 58-related VIN 2/3, VaIN2/3, AIN2/3, vulvar cancer, vaginal cancer and anal cancer at least 1 month post Dose 3
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 3 (Month 7) up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of other HPV types related CIN 2/3 at least 1 month post Dose 3
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 3 (Month 7) up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of other HPV types related VIN 1/2/3, VaIN1/2/3, AIN1/2/3, vulvar cancer, vaginal cancer and anal cancer at least 1 month post Dose 3
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 3 (Month 7) up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of HPV 31-, 33-, 45-, 52-, and 58-related high-grade cervical abnormalities (CIN 2/3) at least 1 month post Dose 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 1 up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of HPV 31-, 33-, 45-, 52-, and 58-related 6-month and 12-month Persistent Infection at least 1 month post Dose 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 1 up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of HPV 31-, 33-, 45-, 52-, and 58-related VIN 2/3, VaIN2/3, AIN2/3, vulvar cancer, vaginal cancer and anal cancer at least 1 month post Dose 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 1 up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of HPV 31-, 33-, 45-, 52-, and 58-related VIN 1/2/3, VaIN1/2/3, AIN1/2/3, vulvar cancer, vaginal cancer and anal cancer at least 1 month post Dose 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 1 up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of other HPV types related VIN 2/3, VaIN2/3, AIN2/3, vulvar cancer, vaginal cancer and anal cancer at least 1 month post Dose 3
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 3 (Month 7) up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of other HPV types related CIN 2/3 at least 1 month post Dose 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 1 up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of other HPV types related VIN 1/2/3, VaIN1/2/3, AIN1/2/3, vulvar cancer, vaginal cancer and anal cancer at least 1 month post Dose 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 1 up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: The person-year incidence of other HPV types related VIN 2/3, VaIN2/3, AIN2/3, vulvar cancer, vaginal cancer and anal cancer at least 1 month post Dose 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 1 up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Report at Least 1 Solicited Injection-site and Systemic Adverse Event 30 minutes post any vaccination
Percentage of Participants Who Report at Least 1 Solicited Adverse Event 7 days post any vaccination
Percentage of Participants Who Report at Least 1 Solicited and Unsolicited Adverse Event 30 days post any vaccination
Percentage of Participants Who Experience at Least 1 Serious Adverse Event (SAE) from 1st vaccination to the completion of study
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 3 (Month 7) up to Month 84

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Experience Pregnancy from 1st vaccination to the completion of study
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month post vaccination 3 (Month 7) up to Month 84
30 days post third dose of vaccination

arm_group.description: Participants in this arm would receive 9-valent Human Papillomavirus (Types 6, 11, 16, 18,31,33,45,52 and 58) Recombinant Vaccine (Hansenula Polymorpha)
Participants in this arm would receive GARDASIL®

intervention.intervention_name: 9-valent Human Papillomavirus (Types 6, 11, 16, 18,31,33,45,52 and 58) Recombinant Vaccine (Hansenula Polymorpha)
intervention.description: Subjects received 3 doses of 9-valent HPV vaccine according to a 0, 2, 6-month schedule.
Subjects received 3 doses of Placebo according to a 0, 2, 6-month schedule

facility.name: Rongan County Center for Disease Control and Prevention
